name: Paginator
short: A cog that allows users to create their own paginated menus within Discord consisting of embeds and/or non-embedded content.
description: The Paginator cog provides a simple way for users to create paginated menus within Discord. These menus can consist of either embeds or non-embedded content, and can be customized to fit the user's needs. The Paginator cog is easy to use and can be a great addition to any Discord server.
end_user_data_statement: The Paginator cog does not store user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Paginator!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
